murphy78 presents Microsoft Office ProPlus 2010 SP2 VL RTL Sep2013
Contains SP2 and the KB files currently needed as of Sep9-2013

MSDN SOURCE:
en_office_professional_plus_2010_with_sp1_x86_x64_dvd_730330.iso

Release File:

Size: 1.75GiB
CRC32: 44482246
MD5: FBF841D4C9E97913A7BD78C633CEE4FC
SHA-1: 2E3296EF64C6EF804FBF21086AB28D2AE52BCEA2

Notes:
I've converted the x86 version inside the MSDN Source iso using MTK.
I updated the Updates folder to add the appropriate SP2 files and recent
Microsoft Updates.

I've included a one-time effort Retail version conversion zip that uses
smartversion 2. This is exclusive for this month's version for the few
people who need to install using a retail key. DO NOT BUG me for retail
keys. I will ignore those requests. Use the conversion ONLY if you already
have a key in mind. I will not help you install said key or activate it.
Use the built-in activation windows that are supplied with Office.

MSP files in Updates Folder:
access-x-none.msp, accessde-en-us.msp, ace-x-none.msp,
clientshared64mui-en-us.msp, clientshared64ww-x-none.msp,
clientsharedmui-en-us.msp, csi-x-none.msp, excel-x-none.msp,
filterpack-x-none.msp, imeww-x-none.msp, mso-x-none.msp,
oart-x-none.msp, oartconv-x-none.msp, officesuitemui-en-us.msp,
officesuiteww-x-none.msp, onenote-x-none.msp, osamui-en-us.msp,
osetup-x-none.msp, outlfltr-x-none.msp, outlook-x-none.msp,
powerpoint-x-none.msp, powerpointintl-en-us.msp, proof-en-us.msp,
proof-es-es.msp,proofing-en-us.msp,
vviewer-x-none.msp, word-x-none.msp, wwlibcxm-en-us.msp

You can activate using MS Toolkit 2.4.9 (Included).
Click the office button, then activation tab, etc.
I personally use KMS Server Service from the Activator dropdown menu, but
AutoKMS will work fine if you allow it through your security programs, such as
Windows Defender on Windows 8 or Security Essentials, ESET, etc. EZ-Activator
installs AutoKMS, so the same advice applies.

Install instructions:
Mount ISO or extract to HD
Run Setup.exe
